title: Chaim Topol
summary: Chaim Topol (Hebrew: חיים טופול‎; born September 9, 1935), also spelled Haym Topol,[1] mononymously known as Topol,[2] is an Israeli actor, comedian, singer, film producer, author, and illustrator. He is best known for his portrayal of Tevye the Dairyman, the lead role in the musical Fiddler on the Roof, on both stage and screen, having performed this role more than 3,500 times in shows and revivals from the late 1960s through 2009.[2]
